scripts.pdf: /Applications/Google\ Chrome.app/Contents/MacOS/Google\ Chrome --headless --print-to-pdf=public/captainslog.pdf --no-pdf-header-footer file://$(pwd)/public/pdf/index.html; cp public/captainslog.pdf content/captainslog.pdf;
scripts.build: tinacms dev -c "hugo; npm run images"; npm run pdf
